advancements.phoenix.ash.title: Project Phoenix: ash
advancements.phoenix.ash.title.descripti: End of the start or start of the end?
advancements.phoenix.ash.corn.descriptio: -How did you get brought to the past ignis monastery? “I took him for a End city.” Easy to confuse.
phoenix.diary.ch1: Hear me, hear me, friend.I’m very, no, seriously ill.What’s the reason? This pain I do not understand.As if wind whistles, listen Over desolate, vacant, still field.Like a grove, leaves blazing I feel.And the drink sheds my leaves as I bend.
